name: Ripped Away(unfinished game jam entry)
description:
Controls:

 - A / D - Strafe Left/Strafe Right-

 -W / S - Move Forward/ Move Backward-

-'F' Key - Toggles Flashlight-

-Left Click - Interact, Inspect Object-

-Right Click - Take Inspected Object-

-Space Bar- Progress Dialogue-

The general idea of the game was:

You recently bought this house, at far lower than the listed price, too! You bought it as-is, and as it turns out, the house was fully furnished.  However, along with furniture, the property appears to have some quirks.

A few days after moving in, you're convinced by the noises you've heard  in the night that you're not the only one living in this house. The question is, what kind of rodents are in the walls... Right?

You decide instead of going back to sleep, you would solve this mystery here and now. Let's just say you've read/heard enough horror stories to know better than to wait for things to get worse...

Unfortunately I couldn't quite get my event systems working the way I needed them to, so setting up timers, story, unique characters, etc. in a week turned out to be a bit more than I was capable of scheduling for, lol! However I've had fun making this, and learned some new things!

Eventually I'll get the hang of picking the right amount of tasks that I can accomplish in one of these weekly jams, but it's always fun to participate!
